about_the_game:
A Soldier’s Struggle is a short visual novel about resilience, love, and the healing power of family. After years away, a young man returns to a life he barely recognizes. As old wounds linger and new challenges emerge, his journey becomes one of rediscovering trust, hope, and the strength found in love. Follow along as he reconnects with his mother and sister and explores new aspects of their relationship.

This is a kinetic novel, meaning it is a linear, story-driven experience with no choices or branching paths—perfect for players who enjoy a short and sweet story.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit sexual content such as incest, as well as some graphical violence.
